subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Vincenzo Nibali, an Italian riding for Liquigas-Doimo, kept the overall lead after the 15th stage of the three week-long Spanish race.
snippet: Vincenzo Nibali, an Italian riding for Liquigas-Doimo, kept the overall lead after the 15th stage of the three week-long Spanish race.
